title: Whats up with matchmaking atm?
body:
Ever since the latest patch, I've been having really weird matchmaking, like being matched with and against diamonds and golds etc in normals, I'm bronze 1 and thats the highest i have ever been, now i know that ranked mmr and normal mmr are different, but if i was at diamond level mmr in normals it would stand to reason that i would be similar in ranked, but I'm not and I'm not diamond level, so why am i being matched with these people? its so frustrating being smashed all game every game, and my team rage at me and are like "wtf, you're bronze?? GG!!!" its good being with high lvl ppl because you can learn from them, but I'm so outclassed atm i cant do anything at all. I play twisted fate a lot and because his skin just ahem out I'm playing him even more, and I'm vsing diamond Zed's and Kat's and its just not happening.

why is this happening? this screenshot is one i took, I'm gangplank, and the victor turned out to be platinum 1 or something.
and I'm not duo'ing

replies.body: Because a lot of high ranked players don't play norms and now they might be playing a few normal games to see how shit the new hud design is and play for the event thing.

Because of the icon rewards, people who just flat out don't play normal's, are playing normals.

EDIT: and if this is ARAM's, some people NEVER play ARAM's.
